@graph.name: Italian Veggie Pasta - Vegan Heaven
@graph.description: Close your eyes and this veggie pasta with olives, zucchini, eggplant, and capers lets you think you're on a vacation to Italy. Full of color and flavor!

@graph.headline: Italian Veggie Pasta
@graph.keywords: eggplant pasta,Italian pasta,Italian pasta recipe,Italian pasta salad,pasta with capers,pasta with roasted veggies,roasted vegetable pasta,vegan pasta,vegan pasta recipes,vegan pasta salad,vegetable pasta dishes,vegetarian pasta recipes,veggie pasta,zucchini pasta

@graph.name: Italian Veggie Pasta
@graph.description: Close your eyes and this veggie pasta with olives, zucchini, eggplant, and capers lets you think you're on a vacation to Italy. Full of color and flavor!
recipeIngredient: 1 cup eggplant, cut into small cubes ((about half a small eggplant))
1 cup zucchini, cut into small cubes ((about one medium zucchini))
1 cup yellow bell pepper, cut into small cubes ((about one small bell pepper))
1/2 cup artichokes in oil, roughly chopped
1/2 cup black olives, cut into rings
1 cup cherry tomatoes, cut into halves
about 1 cup fresh basil leaves, roughly chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the pasta according to the instructions on the package. Drain and set aside.
recipeInstructions.name: Cook the pasta according to the instructions on the package. Drain and set aside.

recipeInstructions.text: In a large pan, heat some oil and sauté the red onion and the garlic for about 2 minutes. Then add the zucchini, the yellow bell pepper, and the eggplant and cook for another 3 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: In a large pan, heat some oil and sauté the red onion and the garlic for about 2 minutes. Then add the zucchini, the yellow bell pepper, and the eggplant and cook for another 3 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the cooked pasta and the rest of the ingredients. Stir in the olive oil, season with salt and pepper, and sprinkle with fresh basil.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the cooked pasta and the rest of the ingredients. Stir in the olive oil, season with salt and pepper, and sprinkle with fresh basil.
